product_name: Dalbello KR 2 Core Ski Boots - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: Responsive and smooth, the advanced-level Dalbello KR Two Core ski boots offer the precision to aggressively romp down the mountain with ease thanks to snug lasts and anatomic boot molds.
short_description: Responsive and smooth, the advanced-level Dalbello KR Two Core ski boots offer the precision to aggressively romp down the mountain with ease thanks to snug lasts and anatomic boot molds.
